LanguageData.AnimalVenerated.label: venerated
LanguageData.AnimalVenerated.description: This animal is considered by believers to hold a special spiritual or moral status, which means it must be venerated and may never be harmed.
LanguageData.AnimalConnection_Strong.label: strong
LanguageData.AnimalConnection_Strong.description: We have a strong connection to our animal friends.
LanguageData.AnimalSlaughter_Prohibited.label: prohibited
LanguageData.AnimalSlaughter_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.AnimalSlaughter_Horrible.description: To slaughter an animal is a horrible thing.
LanguageData.AnimalSlaughter_Disapproved.label: disapproved
LanguageData.AnimalSlaughter_Disapproved.description: To slaughter an animal is an ugly thing.
LanguageData.Apostasy_Abhorrent.label: abhorrent
LanguageData.Apostasy_Abhorrent.description: To leave our ideoligion after having known it is the depth of immorality.
LanguageData.Apostasy_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.Apostasy_Horrible.description: To leave our ideoligion after having known it indicates deep moral flaws.
LanguageData.Apostasy_Disapproved.label: disapproved
LanguageData.Apostasy_Disapproved.description: To leave our ideoligion after having known it indicates character flaws.
LanguageData.ApparelDesired_Strong_Subordinate.label: strong
LanguageData.ApparelDesired_Strong_Subordinate.descri: {GENDER} members will be pleased when wearing {APPAREL_indefinite}. {GENDER} members will arrive wearing {APPAREL_indefinite} unless it interferes with armor.
LanguageData.ApparelDesired_Soft_Subordinate.label: relaxed
LanguageData.ApparelDesired_Soft_Subordinate.descript: {GENDER} members will be pleased when wearing {APPAREL_indefinite}. {GENDER} members will arrive wearing {APPAREL_indefinite} if it doesn't interfere with any other apparel.
LanguageData.NutrientPasteEating_DontMind.label: dont mind
LanguageData.NutrientPasteEating_DontMind.description: There's nothing wrong with a meal of efficient, healthy nutrient paste.
LanguageData.AutonomousWeapons_Prohibited.label: prohibited
LanguageData.AutonomousWeapons_Prohibited.description: Allowing a machine to decide to kill is an absolutely inhuman thing to do.
LanguageData.AutonomousWeapons_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.AutonomousWeapons_Horrible.description: Allowing a machine to decide to kill is a terrible thing.
LanguageData.AutonomousWeapons_Disapproved.label: disapproved
LanguageData.AutonomousWeapons_Disapproved.descriptio: Allowing a machine to decide to kill is an ugly thing.
LanguageData.Blindness_Respected.label: respected
LanguageData.Blindness_Respected.description: To be blind is a moral thing worthy of respect.
LanguageData.Blindness_Elevated.label: elevated
LanguageData.Blindness_Elevated.description: The blind stand pure above the sighted.
LanguageData.Blindness_Sublime.label: sublime
LanguageData.Blindness_Sublime.description: Only the blind can be truly noble, for the sighted find their minds clouded by physical vision.
LanguageData.Blinding_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.Blinding_Horrible.description: Blinding people for ideoligious reasons is horrible.
LanguageData.Blind_Psysense.label: strong
LanguageData.Blind_Psysense.description: Our blind have special ways of connecting with the psychic aether.
LanguageData.BodyMod_Abhorrent.label: abhorrent
LanguageData.BodyMod_Abhorrent.description: To modify the natural human body is a flagrant violation of clear moral laws.
LanguageData.BodyMod_Disapproved.label: disapproved
LanguageData.BodyMod_Disapproved.description: To modify the natural human body is an ugly, dirty act.
LanguageData.BodyMod_Approved.label: approved
LanguageData.BodyMod_Approved.description: Humans should strive to reach our full potential by improving our flawed natural bodies.
LanguageData.Bonding_Disapproved.label: disapproved
LanguageData.Bonding_Disapproved.description: To emotionally bond with a lower being is a shameful act.
LanguageData.IdeoBuilding.label: building
LanguageData.IdeoBuilding.description: A building of ideoligious significance. Only those who follow this ideoligion can build it. It may be used as a focus for rituals.
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Abhorrent.label: abhorrent
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Abhorrent.description: Eating human flesh is a deeply abhorrent and disgusting act.
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Horrible.description: Eating human flesh is a horrible thing to do.
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Disapproved.label: disapproved
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Disapproved.description: Eating human flesh is an ugly thing to do.
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Acceptable.label: acceptable
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Acceptable.description: Human meat is just meat, like any other.
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Preferred.label: preferred
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Preferred.description: To consume human meat is a noble and necessary part of life.
LanguageData.Cannibalism_RequiredStrong.label: required (strong)
LanguageData.Cannibalism_RequiredStrong.description: Consuming human flesh is important. It should be in every meal.
LanguageData.Cannibalism_RequiredRavenous.label: required (ravenous)
LanguageData.Cannibalism_RequiredRavenous.description: Man-flesh is morality. To eat a meal without it is unthinkable.
LanguageData.Charity_Essential.label: essential
LanguageData.Charity_Essential.description: We must always be charitable to those in need. To refuse one would be an inhuman act, no matter the circumstances.
LanguageData.Charity_Important.label: important
LanguageData.Charity_Important.description: It's important to be charitable to those in need. Refusing to help is a terrible act.
LanguageData.Charity_Worthwhile.label: worthwhile
LanguageData.Charity_Worthwhile.description: Helping those in need is a good thing. It makes the community stronger.
LanguageData.Comfort_Ignored.label: ignored
LanguageData.Comfort_Ignored.description: We should pay no attention to comfort.
LanguageData.SlabBed_Preferred.label: preferred
LanguageData.SlabBed_Preferred.description: The right way to sleep is on a slab bed.
LanguageData.Corpses_DontCare.label: don't care
LanguageData.Corpses_DontCare.description: The sight of a dead person is nothing to be concerned about.
LanguageData.DrugUse_Prohibited.label: prohibited
LanguageData.DrugUse_Prohibited.description: The body should absolutely not be poisoned by chemicals. The only exception is the use of medicine in direct medical care.
LanguageData.DrugUse_MedicalOnly.label: medical only
LanguageData.DrugUse_MedicalOnly.description: Poisoning the body for recreational purposes is a deeply immoral act.
LanguageData.DrugUse_MedicalOrSocial.label: medical or social only
LanguageData.DrugUse_MedicalOrSocial.description: A drink with a smoke is fine, especially with friends, but poisoning the body with powerful chemicals is wrong.
LanguageData.FungusEating_Preferred.label: preferred
LanguageData.FungusEating_Preferred.description: Fungus is the right crop to eat. Crops of the light are poisoned by the air and sun.
LanguageData.FungusEating_Despised.label: despised
LanguageData.FungusEating_Despised.description: That dark-grown fungus food is just disgusting.
LanguageData.DrugUse_Essential.label: essential
LanguageData.DrugUse_Essential.description: Exotic states of mind are central to a good life.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Abhorrent.label: intense bigotry
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Abhorrent.description: Other beliefs are evil deceptions ruining the world. It's totally unacceptable to let them exist in the community.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Horrible.label: moderate bigotry
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Horrible.description: Other beliefs are immoral delusions which do real harm. It's bad to let them exist in the community.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Disapproved.label: mild bigotry
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Disapproved.description: Other beliefs are clearly folly. It's not good to let them exist in the community.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Standard.label: neutral
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Standard.description: Other beliefs are neither approved or disapproved.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Approved.label: appreciated
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Approved.description: Other beliefs are worth understanding. It's good to live with others who think differently.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Respected.label: highly appreciated
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Respected.description: Other beliefs hold unique knowledge. It's great to live with others who think differently.
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Exalted.label: exalted
LanguageData.IdeoDiversity_Exalted.description: Working through disagreement is the height of morality. It's very moral to live with others who think differently.
LanguageData.InsectMeatEating_Loved.label: loved
LanguageData.InsectMeatEating_Loved.description: There is nothing more divine than the succulent, slimy flesh of an insect.
LanguageData.KillingInnocentAnimals_Abhorrent.label: abhorrent
LanguageData.KillingInnocentAnimals_Abhorrent.descrip: To kill an innocent animal is a horrifically inhuman act. Innocent animals are those who are not attacking, or who were only driven to attack by human provocation.
LanguageData.KillingInnocentAnimals_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.KillingInnocentAnimals_Horrible.descript: To kill an innocent animal is a horrible act. Innocent animals are those who are not attacking, or who were only driven to attack by human provocation.
LanguageData.KillingInnocentAnimals_Disapproved.label: disapproved
LanguageData.KillingInnocentAnimals_Disapproved.descr: To kill an innocent animal is an ugly act. Innocent animals are those who are not attacking, or who were only driven to attack by human provocation.
LanguageData.Darklight_Preferred.label: darklight preferred
LanguageData.Darklight_Preferred.description: Normal lights are too bright. Darklights are better.
LanguageData.DarknessCombat_Preferred.label: Preferred
LanguageData.DarknessCombat_Preferred.description: We fight better in the dark.
LanguageData.Lovin_Prohibited.label: prohibited
LanguageData.Lovin_Prohibited.description: The physical act of lust is always vile, disgusting, and wrong.
LanguageData.Lovin_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.Lovin_Horrible.description: The physical act of lust is vile, though within marriage it is necessary.
LanguageData.Lovin_SpouseOnly_Strict.label: spouse only (strict)
LanguageData.Lovin_SpouseOnly_Strict.description: To make love with another outside of marriage is deeply immoral.
LanguageData.Lovin_SpouseOnly_Moderate.label: spouse only (moderate)
LanguageData.Lovin_SpouseOnly_Moderate.description: To make love with another outside of marriage is wrong.
LanguageData.Lovin_SpouseOnly_Mild.label: spouse only (mild)
LanguageData.Lovin_SpouseOnly_Mild.description: Though it's understandable to make love with another outside of marriage, it's not a good thing.
LanguageData.Lovin_FreeApproved.label: free and approved
LanguageData.Lovin_FreeApproved.description: The physical act of love is a noble thing, no matter who does it with whom.
LanguageData.MarriageName_AlwaysMans.label: always man's
LanguageData.MarriageName_AlwaysMans.description: Couples must share the man's name.
LanguageData.MarriageName_Random.label: random
LanguageData.MarriageName_Random.description: Couples randomly choose whether to share a name, and which name to share.
LanguageData.MarriageName_KeepNames.label: keep names
LanguageData.MarriageName_KeepNames.description: Both partners keep their names upon marriage.
LanguageData.MarriageName_UsuallyWomans.label: usually woman's
LanguageData.MarriageName_UsuallyWomans.description: Most couples share the woman's name.
LanguageData.MarriageName_AlwaysWomans.label: always woman's
LanguageData.MarriageName_AlwaysWomans.description: Couples must share the woman's name.
LanguageData.MeatEating_Abhorrent.label: abhorrent
LanguageData.MeatEating_Abhorrent.description: Eating meat of any kind is deeply evil.
LanguageData.MeatEating_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.MeatEating_Horrible.description: Eating meat of any kind is a horrible act.
LanguageData.MeatEating_Disapproved.label: disapproved
LanguageData.MeatEating_Disapproved.description: Eating meat of any kind should be avoided.
LanguageData.MeatEating_NonMeat_Disapproved.label: mildly required
LanguageData.MeatEating_NonMeat_Disapproved.descripti: Every meal ought to have meat.
LanguageData.MeatEating_NonMeat_Horrible.label: seriously required
LanguageData.MeatEating_NonMeat_Abhorrent.label: strictly required
LanguageData.MeatEating_NonMeat_Abhorrent.description: If a meal doesn't have meat, the person who eats it must be morally deficient.
LanguageData.Mining_Prohibited.label: prohibited
LanguageData.Mining_Prohibited.description: Raping the natural earth with mining tools is a horrifically evil act.
LanguageData.Mining_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.Mining_Horrible.description: Violating the natural earth with mining tools is a horrible act.
LanguageData.Mining_Disapproved.label: disapproved
LanguageData.Mining_Disapproved.description: Mining into the natural earth is an ugly act.
LanguageData.MiningYield_High.label: high
LanguageData.MiningYield_High.description: Mining is so important that we do it with great focus and respect, and we get more resources because of that.
LanguageData.Nudity_Male_Mandatory.description: Men must be entirely nude at all times. Utility items like shields belts or jump packs are acceptable.
LanguageData.Nudity_Male_Mandatory.label: fully nude
LanguageData.Nudity_Female_Mandatory.label: fully nude
LanguageData.Nudity_Female_Mandatory.description: Women must be entirely nude at all times. Utility items like shields belts or jump packs are acceptable.
LanguageData.Nudity_Male_CoveringAnythingButGroinDisa: Men should cover their groin, but may not cover anything else. Utility items like shields belts or jump packs are acceptable.
LanguageData.Nudity_Female_CoveringAnythingButGroinDi: Women should cover their groin, but may not cover anything else. Utility items like shields belts or jump packs are acceptable.
LanguageData.Nudity_Male_NoRules.label: no rules
LanguageData.Nudity_Male_NoRules.description: A man may display or cover any part of his body.
LanguageData.Nudity_Female_NoRules.label: no rules
LanguageData.Nudity_Female_NoRules.description: A woman may display or cover any part of her body.
LanguageData.Nudity_Male_UncoveredGroinDisapproved.de: Men must cover their groin. The rest of the body may be covered, or not.
Women must cover their groin. The rest of the body may be covered, or not.
LanguageData.Nudity_Male_UncoveredGroinOrChestDisappr: Men must cover their groin and chest. The rest of the body may be covered, or not.
LanguageData.Nudity_Female_UncoveredGroinOrChestDisap: Women must cover their groin and chest. The rest of the body may be covered, or not.
LanguageData.Nudity_Male_UncoveredGroinChestOrHairDis: Men must cover their entire body and hair. The face may be covered, or not.
LanguageData.Nudity_Female_UncoveredGroinChestOrHairD: Women must cover their entire body and hair. The face may be covered, or not.
LanguageData.Nudity_Male_UncoveredGroinChestHairOrFac: Men must cover their entire body, including their hair and face.
LanguageData.Nudity_Female_UncoveredGroinChestHairOrF: Women must cover their entire body, including their hair and face.
LanguageData.OrganUse_Abhorrent.label: totally abhorrent
LanguageData.OrganUse_Abhorrent.description: Any harvesting, trading, or installing natural organs is an abhorrent evil.
LanguageData.OrganUse_HorribleNoSell.label: no harvest or sell
LanguageData.OrganUse_HorribleNoSell.description: Harvesting organs is a horrible thing. Selling any natural organ is pretty bad too. However, it's okay to buy and install them.
LanguageData.OrganUse_HorribleSellOK.label: no harvest
LanguageData.OrganUse_HorribleSellOK.description: Harvesting organs is a horrible thing. However, it's okay to buy, install, or sell them.
LanguageData.OrganUse_Acceptable.label: acceptable
LanguageData.OrganUse_Acceptable.description: It's okay to harvest, buy, install, or sell organs.
LanguageData.Pain_Idealized.label: idealized
LanguageData.Pain_Idealized.description: To experience nerve-singing pain is a mark of morality.
LanguageData.Execution_Abhorrent.label: always abhorrent
LanguageData.Execution_Abhorrent.description: Executing a prisoner is an abhorrent evil under any circumstances.
LanguageData.Execution_Horrible.label: always horrible
LanguageData.Execution_Horrible.description: Executing a prisoner is a horrible thing under any circumstances.
LanguageData.Execution_HorribleIfInnocent.label: horrible if innocent
LanguageData.Execution_HorribleIfInnocent.description: Executing an innocent prisoner is a horrible thing. If the prisoner is guilty, it's acceptable.
LanguageData.Execution_DontCare.label: don't care
LanguageData.Execution_DontCare.description: Executing prisoners is acceptable, whether they are guilty or innocent.
LanguageData.Execution_RespectedIfGuilty.label: respected if guilty
LanguageData.Execution_RespectedIfGuilty.description: Executing prisoners is acceptable. If the prisoner is guilty, it is cause for great happiness.
LanguageData.Execution_Required.label: required
LanguageData.Execution_Required.description: Prisoners must be executed on a regular basis. When they are, it is a happy occasion.
LanguageData.Proselytizing_Occasionally.label: occasional
LanguageData.Proselytizing_Occasionally.description: Those who know the truth should try to bring it to others, when it seems appropriate.
LanguageData.Proselytizing_Sometimes.label: sometimes
LanguageData.Proselytizing_Sometimes.description: Those who know the truth should bring it to others at every opportunity.
LanguageData.Proselytizing_Frequently.label: frequent
LanguageData.Proselytizing_Frequently.description: Those who know the truth have a duty to always spread it and drive out other beliefs.
LanguageData.Raiding_Respected.label: respected
LanguageData.Raiding_Respected.description: We don't work like common laborers, we take from the weak as the strong should. Failing to do so is a mark of shame.
LanguageData.Raiding_Respected.comps.0.thoughtStageDe: Less than {DAYSSINCELASTRAIDTHRESHOLD} days since our last raid
More than {DAYSSINCELASTRAIDTHRESHOLD} days since our last raid
LanguageData.Raiding_Required.label: required
LanguageData.Raiding_Required.description: We don't work like common laborers, we take from the weak as the strong should. Failing to do so is a tremendous shame.
LanguageData.Raiding_Required.comps.0.thoughtStageDes: Less than {DAYSSINCELASTRAIDTHRESHOLD} days since our last raid
More than {DAYSSINCELASTRAIDTHRESHOLD} days since our last raid
LanguageData.Ranching_Central.label: central
LanguageData.Ranching_Central.description: We must raise and consume many large animals, and we must not eat plants.
LanguageData.IdeoRelic.label: relic
LanguageData.Research_None.label: not allowed
LanguageData.Research_None.description: To research technology is an immoral act. It is not to be done.
LanguageData.Research_ExtremelySlow.label: extremely slow
LanguageData.Research_ExtremelySlow.description: Research isn't a worthwhile activity at all. Why try hard at it?
LanguageData.Research_VerySlow.label: very slow
LanguageData.Research_VerySlow.description: Research work is unworthy of serious respect. Better not to be seen trying hard at it.
LanguageData.Research_Slow.label: slow
LanguageData.Research_Slow.description: Research work just isn't particularly meaningful. Why try hard at it?
LanguageData.Research_Normal.label: normal
LanguageData.Research_Normal.description: Research is a worthwhile form of work that the community needs.
LanguageData.Research_Fast.label: fast
LanguageData.Research_Fast.description: Research is an especially virtuous activity.
LanguageData.Research_VeryFast.label: very fast
LanguageData.Research_VeryFast.description: Research is among the most meaningful acts a person can perform.
LanguageData.Funeral.description: A gathering that occurs around a believer's grave after they die and are buried. If the body is destroyed, an empty grave can be used. Slaves don't get funerals.
LanguageData.Funeral.label: funeral
LanguageData.Funeral.extraTextPawnDeathLetter: {PAWN_nameDef} should be buried and given a funeral so {PAWN_possessive} friends and family can say farewell.
LanguageData.FuneralNoCorpse.description: A gathering that occurs around a believer's grave after they die and are buried. If the body is destroyed, an empty grave can be used. Slaves don't get funerals.
LanguageData.FuneralNoCorpse.label: funeral (no corpse)
LanguageData.Festival.description: A celebratory gathering for your colonists to have fun. A leader will give an encouraging speech, then everyone will socialize for a while.
LanguageData.Festival.label: social festival
LanguageData.DateRitualConsumable.description: A celebratory gathering for your colonists to have fun. A leader will give an encouraging speech, then everyone will socialize for a while.
LanguageData.DateRitualConsumable.label: christmas tree party
LanguageData.LeaderSpeech.label: leader speech
LanguageData.LeaderSpeech.description: A rousing speech intended to improve morale. Colonists will gather, and the leader will speak for a few hours. If all goes well, listeners will feel inspired, and gain respect for the leader. If it goes poorly, the speech will do social damage.
LanguageData.Trial.label: trial
LanguageData.Trial.description: A trial over some heinous accusation. The initiator will accuse someone of terrible wrongdoing and gather people for a trial. Spectators will listen as the accuser and accused argue back and forth, then decide if the accusation is true. If the accused is convicted, you can freely banish, arrest or execute them and nobody will mind. The chance of a conviction depends on the social abilites of the accused and accuser, and the number of spectators.
LanguageData.TrialPrisoner.label: trial
LanguageData.TrialPrisoner.description: A trial over some heinous accusation. The initiator will accuse someone of terrible wrongdoing and gather people for a trial. Spectators will listen as the accuser and accused argue back and forth, then decide if the accusation is true. If the accused is convicted, you can freely banish, arrest or execute them and nobody will mind. The chance of a conviction depends on the social abilites of the accused and accuser, and the number of spectators.
LanguageData.Conversion.label: conversion ritual
LanguageData.Conversion.description: Try to persuade someone into joining your ideoligion.
LanguageData.ScarificationCeremony.label: scarification
LanguageData.ScarificationCeremony.description: A ritualistic scarring where a cutter carves ideoligious symbols into a target. The audience will watch as the cutter gives a speech, performs the cutting, then says some finishing words.
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.label: blinding
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.description: A cutter will ritualistically blind a target. The audience will watch as the cutter gives a speech, cuts out both of the target's eyes, and says some closing words. The target will be left bleeding and need immediate medical care.
LanguageData.TrialMentalState.label: trial
LanguageData.TrialMentalState.description: A trial over some heinous accusation. The initiator will accuse someone of terrible wrongdoing and gather people for a trial. Spectators will listen as the accuser and accused argue back and forth, then decide if the accusation is true. If the accused is convicted, you can freely banish, arrest or execute them and nobody will mind. The chance of a conviction depends on the social abilites of the accused and accuser, and the number of spectators.
LanguageData.TreeConnection.label: tree connection ritual
LanguageData.TreeConnection.description: A connector will connect with a Gauranlen tree. The connector will touch the Gauranlen tree and speak to it, forming a permanent link. Others gather in a circle to watch and add force to the ritual.
LanguageData.Execution.label: public execution
LanguageData.Execution.description: An executioner will publicly execute a prisoner. The executioner will give a short speech, execute the prisoner by cutting, and say some closing words. Spectating slaves will become afraid and intimidated, and colonists will feel exhilarated or disgusted depending on their beliefs.
LanguageData.GladiatorDuel.label: gladiator duel
LanguageData.GladiatorDuel.description: A duel between prisoners or slaves. The organizer will give a speech to excite the crowd, then the duelists will fight until one of them falls or time runs out. If weapons are in the arena, the duelists will pick up and use them.
LanguageData.IdeoRitualSeat.label: ritual seat
LanguageData.IdeoRitualSeat.description: A building of ideoligious significance. Believers sit or kneel on this while watching rituals.
LanguageData.IdeoRole_Moralist.label: moral guide
LanguageData.IdeoRole_Moralist.description: A moral/spiritual leader who heads rituals and personally counsels believers.
LanguageData.IdeoRole_Leader.label: leader
LanguageData.IdeoRole_Leader.description: A leader who holds the group together and represents your faction in diplomatic interactions.
LanguageData.IdeoRole_ShootingSpecialist.label: shooting specialist
LanguageData.IdeoRole_ShootingSpecialist.description: A special ideoligious status focusing on ranged combat to the exclusion of all else. This specialized role gives increased accuracy and the ability to boost the shooting abilites of nearby allies. Holders of this role will refuse to do many kinds of non-shooting-related work.
LanguageData.IdeoRole_MeleeSpecialist.label: melee specialist
LanguageData.IdeoRole_MeleeSpecialist.description: A special ideoligious status focusing on melee combat to the exclusion of all else. This specialized role gives increased dodge and hit chance in melee combat and ability to the boost melee abilites for nearby allies. Holders of this role will refuse to do many kinds of non-melee-related work.
LanguageData.IdeoRole_ResearchSpecialist.label: research specialist
LanguageData.IdeoRole_ResearchSpecialist.description: A special ideoligious status focusing on research to the exclusion of all else. This specialized role gives increased research and hacking speed, and the ability to boost research abilities of nearby allies. Holders of this role will refuse to perform some non-research tasks.
LanguageData.IdeoRole_PlantSpecialist.label: plants specialist
LanguageData.IdeoRole_PlantSpecialist.description: A special ideoligious status focusing on planting to the exclusion of all else. This specialized role gives increased sowing and harvesting efficiency, and the ability to boost the farming speed of nearby allies. Holders of this role will refuse to perform some non-plants-related work.
LanguageData.IdeoRole_ProductionSpecialist.label: production specialist
LanguageData.IdeoRole_ProductionSpecialist.descriptio: A special ideoligious status focusing on crafting and construction to the exclusion of all else. This specialized role gives increased crafting and construction efficiency, and the ability to boost the production abilities of nearby allies. Holders of this role will refuse to do some non-production work.
LanguageData.IdeoRole_MiningSpecialist.label: mining specialist
LanguageData.IdeoRole_MiningSpecialist.description: A special ideoligious status focusing on mining to the exclusion of all else. This specialized role gives increased mining speed, and the ability to boost the mining speed of nearby allies. Holders of this role will refuse to do some non-mining work.
LanguageData.IdeoRole_AnimalsSpecialist.label: Animals specialist
LanguageData.IdeoRole_AnimalsSpecialist.description: A special ideoligious status focusing on animals to the exclusion of all else. This specialized role gives increased taming and training efficiency, and the ability to boost the animals-related abilities of nearby allies. Holders of this role will refuse to perform some non-animals-related tasks.
LanguageData.IdeoRole_MedicalSpecialist.label: medical specialist
LanguageData.IdeoRole_MedicalSpecialist.description: A special ideoligious status focusing on medicine to the exclusion of all else. This specialized role gives improved surgery and tending efficiency, and the ability to boost the medical abilities of nearby allies. Believers who receive care from one of this role will be happy about it. Holders of this role will refuse to perform some non-medical tasks.
LanguageData.Scarification_Extreme.label: extreme
LanguageData.Scarification_Extreme.description: Every person ought to bear the ritual scars - all over.
LanguageData.Scarification_Heavy.label: heavy
LanguageData.Scarification_Heavy.description: Every person ought to bear the ritual scars - many of them.
LanguageData.Scarification_Minor.label: minor
LanguageData.Scarification_Minor.description: Every person ought to bear a ritual scar.
LanguageData.Scarification_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.Scarification_Horrible.description: Scarifying people for ideoligious reasons is horrible.
LanguageData.Skullspike_Desired.label: desired
LanguageData.Skullspike_Desired.description: A skull on a spike symbolizes our superiority.
LanguageData.Skullspike_Disapproved.label: disapproved
LanguageData.Skullspike_Disapproved.description: Putting skulls on spikes is a barbaric practice.
LanguageData.Slavery_Abhorrent.label: abhorrent
LanguageData.Slavery_Abhorrent.description: Owning or trading human beings is deeply evil.
LanguageData.Slavery_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.Slavery_Horrible.description: Owning or trading human beings is a horrible thing.
LanguageData.Slavery_Disapproved.label: disapproved
LanguageData.Slavery_Disapproved.description: Slavery is part of life, though it is extremely distasteful.
LanguageData.Slavery_Acceptable.label: acceptable
LanguageData.Slavery_Acceptable.description: Slavery is a normal, unremarkable part of life.
LanguageData.Slavery_Honorable.label: honorable
LanguageData.Slavery_Honorable.description: One who owns and trades slaves should be honored and respected.
LanguageData.SmallSpaces_Acceptable.label: don't care
LanguageData.SmallSpaces_Acceptable.description: There's nothing bothersome about being in tight quarters.
LanguageData.SpouseCount_Male_MaxTwo.label: two or fewer
LanguageData.SpouseCount_Male_MaxTwo.description: Men may have up to two spouses.
LanguageData.SpouseCount_Female_MaxTwo.label: two or fewer
LanguageData.SpouseCount_Female_MaxTwo.description: Women may have up to two spouses.
LanguageData.SpouseCount_Male_MaxThree.label: three or fewer
LanguageData.SpouseCount_Male_MaxThree.description: Men may have up to three spouses.
LanguageData.SpouseCount_Female_MaxThree.label: three or fewer
LanguageData.SpouseCount_Female_MaxThree.description: Women may have up to three spouses.
LanguageData.SpouseCount_Male_MaxFour.label: four or fewer
LanguageData.SpouseCount_Male_MaxFour.description: Men may have up to four spouses.
LanguageData.SpouseCount_Female_MaxFour.label: four or fewer
LanguageData.SpouseCount_Female_MaxFour.description: Women may have up to four spouses.
LanguageData.SpouseCount_Male_Unlimited.description: Men may have as many spouses as they like.
LanguageData.SpouseCount_Male_Unlimited.label: unlimited
LanguageData.SpouseCount_Female_Unlimited.description: Women may have as many spouses as they like.
LanguageData.SpouseCount_Female_Unlimited.label: unlimited
LanguageData.SleepAccelerator_Preferred.label: preferred
LanguageData.SleepAccelerator_Preferred.description: One should always use a sleep accelerator. Slow-sleeping is just foolishly wasting your potential.
LanguageData.NeuralSupercharge_Preferred.label: preferred
LanguageData.NeuralSupercharge_Preferred.description: Having a neural supercharge is the new standard. Without it, you're obsolete.
LanguageData.Biosculpting_Accelerated.label: Accelerated
LanguageData.Biosculpting_Accelerated.description: All biosculpting cycles take half the usual time.
LanguageData.AgeReversal_Demanded.label: Demanded
LanguageData.AgeReversal_Demanded.description: Why get old? One must have a once-yearly age reversal treatment in the biosculpter pod.
LanguageData.BioSculpter_Despised.label: despised
LanguageData.BioSculpter_Despised.description: Biosculpter pods violate the purity human flesh and should never be used.
LanguageData.TreeCutting_Prohibited.label: prohibited
LanguageData.TreeCutting_Prohibited.description: To violate the forest by cutting down a tree is a deeply abhorrent act and should never be done.
LanguageData.TreeCutting_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.TreeCutting_Horrible.description: To cut down a tree is a horrible act.
LanguageData.TreeCutting_Disapproved.label: disapproved
LanguageData.TreeCutting_Disapproved.description: To cut down a tree is a distasteful thing to do.
LanguageData.Trees_Desired.label: desired
LanguageData.Trees_Desired.description: It's essential to live surrounded by beautiful trees.
LanguageData.GauranlenConnection_Strong.label: strong
LanguageData.GauranlenConnection_Strong.description: We have a special connection with the Gauranlen trees. The trees refocus production easily under our influence, and we are not satisfied unless we have that connection.
LanguageData.GauranlenConnection_Strong.comps.0.thoug: Want Gauranlen connection (min expectation: Very low)
Want Gauranlen connection (min expectation: Sky high)
LanguageData.NobleDespisedWeapons.label: noble and despised
LanguageData.NobleDespisedWeapons.description: We have preferences on which weapons should or should not be used in combat.
LanguageData.WorkDrive_Tripled.label: tripled
LanguageData.WorkDrive_Tripled.description: The duration of the leader's work drive ability is tripled.
